巉字的基本解释

巉
chán
山势高峻：巉刻（ａ．山峰陡峭；ｂ．言词尖刻）。巉岩。巉峭。巉峻。巉崖。巉巉。

巉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》鋤銜切，平銜，崇。］
［《廣韻》仕檻切，上檻，崇。］
“漸4”的被通假字。
(1)险峻陡峭。
(2)嶙峋突兀。
(3)锐利；尖锐。

巉字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巉； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页322第24
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】鋤銜切【正韻】鉏咸切，?音讒。巉巖，高也。【正字通】山險絕如劖刻也。【宋玉·高唐賦】登巉巖而下望兮。【宋炳·登半石山詩】萬樹巉巖詭。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】士檻切【集韻】士減切，?音斬。與嶃嶄同。　又通作漸。【詩·小雅】漸漸之石，維其高矣。【註】漸，士銜反。高峻貌。　【集韻】或作?。俗作巉，非。宗炳《登半石山詩》。

Basic explanation of words
cliff
chán
The mountains are high and steep: carved (a. steep peaks; b. sharp words). Yanyan. Cliffy. Jun Jun. Cliff.巉巉.
cliff
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" hoe title cut, flat title, Chong. ]
["Guangyun" official threshold cut, upper threshold, Chong. ]
"Gradually 4" was passed falsely.
(1) Dangerous and steep.
(2) Jumbo and abrupt.
(3) Sharp; sharp.
cliff
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [Mountain Character Department] 　巉; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 322 24
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Hoe title cut [Zheng Yun] salty cut,? Sound slander. Yanyan is high. 【Zhengzitong】Mountains are as dangerous as engraved. 【Song Yu·Gao Tang Fu】Climb the rock and look down. 【Song Bing·Deng Banshishan Poetry】Wan Shuyanyan is a strange thing.　[Jade Pian] [Guangyun] Shi threshold cut [Ji Yun] Shi cut and cut, sound cut. Same as 嶃趃.　Through gradually. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Gradually a stone, maintaining its height. [Note] Gradually, the title of the scholar is reversed. Majestic appearance.　【Jiyun】or make?. Vulgar, non-existent. Zong Bing's "Poems on Mount Banshishan".
